title: Practice against champs
body: There should be a lot more bots to be able to practice against in custom games so it would help in normal's if you've been practicing against more bots and also making the bots a little more difficult since their builds could be better

replies.body: Just head into Normals, the only way you are gonna get better is by playing against other real players.
Bots are there for practice, not for nothing so there should be more plus they took a few bots out

They may be there for practice but your overshadowing what sort of practice they are there for.

Past your first few games, the main reason to have bot's in a custom is to practice CSing against a lane opponent so you can learn to CS against Harass.

The main thing to learn from bots past level 30 is that if your enemy teams were this co-ordinated with CC you'd be fucked up the arse.
You're missing the point... Having more bots would give you the opportunity to learn to play against who you want to go against -.-

No it won't, because no player acts like a bot.

Unless your in bronze 5, and even then bronze 5's act randomly.
Yeah. I use bots to practice heavy mechanical intensive champions like Azir or a champion that needs practice in positioning or just playing around high outplay potential kits like Yasuo, Zed.
Practicing against bots would only help you beat bronze 5s
